1254910.name: King Of Bali Soundtrack
1254910.description: This is a concept album based off King Key Games' hit Visual Novel "King of Bali". Composed and produced by King Key Games' in-house composer, DJ Twili(kn)ight, these epic EDM, Future Bass and Dream Trance tracks have a uniquely tropical vibe that will bring you back to your amazing holiday in Bali!
